垍字的基本解释

垍
jì
坚硬的土或土质坚硬：“其土坚垍，其利悠久”。

垍字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jì］
［《廣韻》具冀切，去至，羣。］
(1)坚硬的土。
(2)土质坚硬。
(3)指陶器。见宋戴侗《六书故》。

垍字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　垍； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页227第31
【廣韻】其冀切【集韻】巨至切【韻會】奇寄切，?音洎。【說文】堅土也。一曰陶器。

垍字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
垍字的起名意思

坚土。

Bian
Basic explanation of words
Bian
jì
Hard soil or hard soil: "The soil is strong and its benefits are long."
Bian
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jì］
["Guangyun" has Jiqie, Gozhi, group. ]
(1) Hard soil.
(2) The soil is hard.
(3) Refers to pottery. See Song Daidong's "The Six Ancient Books".
Bian
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Ugly Collection] [The Ministry of Soil Characters] 　垍; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 227 31
[Guang Yun] Qi Ji Qi [Ji Yun] Ju Zhi Qi [Yun Hui] Qi Ji Qi Qi,? The sound is broken. [Said the text] Hard soil also. One is pottery.
